name: Christopher Bowman
bio: Enrolled in General Assemblies Software Engineering Immersive bootcamp. Former Structural Engineer at General Dynamics Electric Boat, with a strong background in scripting and Finite Element Analysis. I am passionate about the future of defense and technology. Outside of academics, my hobbies include running, reading history, traveling, and playing sports. In the future, I want to apply my skills and experience at the highest level of industry and further push humanity towards new standards.
